AllowedLocations.description: A list of locations to allow game session placement in, in the form of AWS Region codes such as us-west-2.

GameSessionQueueDestination.description: A fleet or alias designated in a game session queue.

LocationOrder.description: The prioritization order to use for fleet locations, when the PriorityOrder property includes LOCATION.

PlayerLatencyPolicy.description: Sets a latency cap for individual players when placing a game session.

properties.name: MaximumIndividualPlayerLatencyMilliseconds
properties.description: The maximum latency value that is allowed for any player, in milliseconds. All policies must have a value set for this property.

type.description: The maximum latency value that is allowed for any player, in milliseconds. All policies must have a value set for this property.

properties.name: PolicyDurationSeconds
properties.description: The length of time, in seconds, that the policy is enforced while placing a new game session.

type.description: The length of time, in seconds, that the policy is enforced while placing a new game session.

PriorityOrder.description: The recommended sequence to use when prioritizing where to place new game sessions.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

resource.description: The AWS::GameLift::GameSessionQueue resource creates an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) game session queue.

properties.name: CustomEventData
properties.description: Information that is added to all events that are related to this game session queue.

type.description: Information that is added to all events that are related to this game session queue.

properties.name: Destinations
properties.description: A list of fleets and/or fleet aliases that can be used to fulfill game session placement requests in the queue.

type.description: A list of fleets and/or fleet aliases that can be used to fulfill game session placement requests in the queue.

properties.name: FilterConfiguration
properties.description: A list of locations where a queue is allowed to place new game sessions.

type.description: A list of locations where a queue is allowed to place new game sessions.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A descriptive label that is associated with game session queue. Queue names must be unique within each Region.

type.description: A descriptive label that is associated with game session queue. Queue names must be unique within each Region.

properties.name: NotificationTarget
properties.description: An SNS topic ARN that is set up to receive game session placement notifications.

type.description: An SNS topic ARN that is set up to receive game session placement notifications.

properties.name: PlayerLatencyPolicies
properties.description: A set of policies that act as a sliding cap on player latency.

type.description: A set of policies that act as a sliding cap on player latency.

properties.name: PriorityConfiguration
properties.description: Custom settings to use when prioritizing destinations and locations for game session placements.

type.description: Custom settings to use when prioritizing destinations and locations for game session placements.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: TimeoutInSeconds
properties.description: The maximum time, in seconds, that a new game session placement request remains in the queue.

type.description: The maximum time, in seconds, that a new game session placement request remains in the queue.

attributes.description: The AWS::GameLift::GameSessionQueue resource creates an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) game session queue.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift game session queue resource and uniquely identifies it.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift game session queue resource and uniquely identifies it.
